text: Vasili Mikhailovich Zhupikov () (16 January 1954 â€“ 7 June 2015) was a Soviet football player and a Russian coach. Zhupikov made his debut for USSR on September 7, 1977 in a game against Poland. He played in the UEFA Euro 1980 qualifiers (USSR did not qualify for the final tournament). ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian football managers
title: Vasili Zhupikov
